articles.author: Jesse Hassenger
articles.title: Devotion review: A real-life action-drama takes on Top Gun: Maverick - Polygon
articles.description: Marvel Cinematic Universe star Jonathan Majors and Top Gun: Maverick star Glen Powell headline Devotion, a military drama based on the life of America’s first Black Navy aviator. In theaters Nov. 23.
articles.content: At first, it seems supremely unlucky that Devotion is being released in the shadow of Top Gun: Mavericks utter domination of the 2022 box office. Devotion is another movie about elite naval pilots, f… [+4798 chars]

articles.author: Columbia Climate School
articles.title: Iron-Rich Dust From South America Played Role in Last Two Glacial Periods, Says Study - Columbia University
articles.description: Dust from the land that gets blown into the ocean appears to influence natural climate swings. A new study looks into where much of that dust came from in the past 260,000 years.
